title: A Real Monster (Person of Interest)(1 x 21)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: This show is literally the best thing ever. I miss it sooo much.
Reese pulls no punches when it comes to men hurting their girlfriends or wives.
When Reese undoes his top jacket button, you know it's about to get real.
Am I the only one who sees Jim Caviezel as the successor for the Bruce Wayne/Batman mantle?
Show him what a real monster looks like. Damn, that had me shook
description:
John attacks the U.S. Marshals service in an attempt to make a Marshal stop stalking his wife.

I do not own Person of Interest, all rights go to its creators and distributors.
